Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- MessageService for managing acknowledgment notifications.
 - UI settings tab for acknowledgment configuration.
 - Added Client <-> Server Version Check to prevent connecting Outdated Clients that are missing important features.
 - Add new setting to control (waiting for acknowledgment) popups separately
 - Implement delayed data push for new users to stabilize connections
 - Add character reload delay after acknowledgment to prevent flickering
 - Refactor notification service to respect new acknowledgment settings
